alert.note: Alert for Kingman; Reno; Rice (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 8:06PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Reno, southeastern Rice and northwestern Kingman Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 805 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Sterling to Plevna to near Sylvia to near Sawyer. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hutchinson, South Hutchinson, Sterling, Nickerson, Arlington, Cunningham, Turon, Partridge, Sylvia, Plevna, Abbyville, Nashville, Willowbrook, Langdon and Penalosa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central and central Kansas.
